text: Question: Will data lost if chaincode get upgrade? Suppose we deployed chaincode_A_V1. We put data to hyperledger fabric blockchain. Suppose we need to upgrade chaincode_v2. All Data will be lost. Correct? (Because it seems that data cannot be shared in different chaincodes, correct?)
Or we need data migration from chaincode_A_v1 to chaincode_A_v2 ?
